EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Unlocking the Potential of Care Coordination
Image Female Doctor using computer
We’re sorry we missed you. We recorded the discussion and have it available for you to access anytime. Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any additional questions about our virtual care solutions.
Watch the webinar <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/webinar/unlocking-the-potential-of-care-coordination?utm_source=TDH&utm_medium=email&utm_content=HHS&utm_campaign=202207-HHS-ENT-SEVT-HMA-Webinar-with-MSFT]]>
Watch our on-demand webinar to: Understand the value of an omnichannel virtual care strategy to improve care coordination and collaboration Explore the technical infrastructure required to empower care team collaboration, enable real-time interventions, and deliver a connected, data-driven and seamless virtual health experience Learn about Northwell Health’s innovative approach to care delivery across the care continuum
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
